def calculate_total_scores_sum(N, scores):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
    total_sum = 0
    for i in range(N):
        total_sum += scores[i] * (i + 1)
    total_sum = 2 ** (N - 1) * total_sum % MOD
    return total_sum
